td.content: s:29 year old white male author presents with 2 days history of worsening moderate lethargy, severe frequent urination, moderate hyperesthesia in lower limbs and Diabetes. denies any alcohol use Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 75 in, Weight 133 lbs, Temperature 97.7 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15, Basic Metabolic Panel BUN=30 mg/dL,creatinine=2 mg/dL, Arterial Blood Gas 6.0,HCO3=17 meq/L, rectal exam = normal, no masses found, Eyes = OD: 20/150, OU:20/100, normal pupillary reflex, DTRs: 2+ throughout, sensation = decreased pinprick sensation B/L lower extremity, appears in NAD, appropriate speech, Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, Extremities = B/L 2+ pitting edema throughout a:Type 1 Diabetes p:administered insulin aspart - 100 mg/mL subcutaneous daily, performed Basic Metabolic Panel, Arterial Blood Gas, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
